relevant_communication:
The University works extensively with the League of European Research Universities on policy issues at EU level, and with the Russell Group EU Expert Group and Universities UK counterparts 
 
University staff interact with members of the Commission 
 
In terms of so-called 'Brexit', the University has a keen interest in developments and in making the case for the interests of HE and research to feature strongly in discussions and planning
goals__remit: The University of Oxford aims to lead the world in research and education. We seek to do this in ways which benefit society on a national and a global scale.
